data.message: FaceBook: Please stop auto switching my News Feed to what YOU want with Top Stories! I don't care about what YOU perceive as the Top Stories. I like my default to be MOST RECENT, please, leave this as is.

replies.message: Hi Steve. We appreciate your feedback concerning the Most Recent feature as it helps us ensure that we're providing the best possible experience for everyone. Please let us know what you would change about it here: http://on.fb.me/KNorNU - Kristen
I agree with steve, while playing games and collecting bonuses I need it to stay on most recent. FB please adjust .
how about if I want pages hidden or not to show  up in my news feed, that they stay hidden or not seen again.....
